name: On the Moon (Kieron Scott)
description:
Designed by Miranda Friedman, aged 6, and created in the space of an hour. Uploaded mostly for her as thought she would get a kick out of being able to play the game she designed wherever she was.

Included Pico-8 source code (which lets be honest was incredibly rushed but functional). If anyone actually wants it I can do Windows, Mac, Linux, and RPi builds too.

Controls:

  • Player 1: Arrow Keys
  • Player 2: S,F,E,D
  • Menu: Arrow keys to choose and X,C to select
